commit.message: Update rustc-ap-* crates to 659.0.0 for rustfmt-1.4.15 (#4184)

verification.payload:
tree c02f28ff57c6573f74391a46de00cded030b2782
parent a5cb5d26833cfda6fa2ed35735448953f728bd5e
author Seiichi Uchida <seuchida@gmail.com> 1589877088 +0900
committer GitHub <noreply@github.com> 1589877088 +0900

Update rustc-ap-* crates to 659.0.0 for rustfmt-1.4.15 (#4184)

files.patch:
@@ -47,6 +47,8 @@ matrix:
 script:
   - |
     if [ -z ${INTEGRATION} ]; then
+      export CFG_RELEASE_CHANNEL=nightly
+      export CFG_RELEASE=nightly
       cargo build
       cargo test
       cargo test -- --ignored
